DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare rate extent absorption Dronabinol 10 mg capsule verse Marinol .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Dronabinol Capsules 10 mg Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: To compare plasma level dronabinol ( delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol ) principle active metabolite 11-OH-delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol level produce administration test formulation produce administration market reference product , fasted condition .
